body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Star Autos, my name is Randy Martinez. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Margaret! Can you please provide me with your phone number, digit by digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And can you also confirm your email address, one character at a time?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's m a r g a r e t p r i c e at g m a i l dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Margaret. Is there anything else that you would like to add or ask about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I'm feeling happy with our conversation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Margaret. Thank you for your time today. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day! Goodbye.
